name: Yuletide Legends: The Brothers Claus Hidden Object
name_original: Yuletide Legends: The Brothers Claus Hidden Object
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

As one of Santa’s little helpers, you’ve been given the task of tracking down some presents for the good little boys and girls. What should be a simple chore though, takes a dark turn when an evil force hijacks the North Pole. Santa’s gone missing, and no one seems to know where he went. It’s up to you to find out what’s going on, and to save Christmas in time for the holidays!

• IT’S A BIG JOB FOR A LITTLE ELF!
This undertaking will be no small matter. Can you discover who’s behind this invasion and stop them from spoiling the celebration?

• WHAT HAPPENED TO SANTA CLAUS?
Search for the merry old man in red through colorful hidden object scenes.

• STOP THE EVIL FORCE FROM RUINING CHRISTMAS
Save the day by solving a variety of vibrant puzzles and magical mini-games.

• MRS. CLAUS TO THE RESCUE IN THE DELIGHTFUL BONUS GAME
Solve another Christmas mystery and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectibles Gifts, morphing objects, and more!
